item.description:
Explore the basics of nembutsu. How is it a life transforming practice? Why is is called Great Practice?  In this talk/discussion, Shoju will look into the source and meaning of the nembutsu and how its voicing expresses our noetic awakening to the Primal Vow known as shinjin. The source of talk will draw from the writings of Shao-tao, Honen, Yuien-bo and Shinran Shonin. Presented by Shoju.

Visit our homepage at www.bffct.net for more information and learn more about Shin Buddhism.

 

p.s. REMINDER - Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
